channel.title: Object not working?
channel.description:
Hi, i was going to chnage my home, but the stairs are not working! theres stairs on teh east and west side, case 6087 c.getPA().movePlayer(2880, 10199, 1) break;
they work for the east side, but not the west? why?

item.title: Object not working?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

ugh. this is confusing

Read full topic

item.title: Object not working?
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

No the face is which way it is facing. And if they are both the same object id then you’ll have to make a custom interface to open and choose which side to go to.

Read full topic

item.title: Object not working?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:2, topic:399562”]Its a different object Id for both stairs. Just make it the same moveplayer but change the case ##.
So the new Case would just be.

case ####:
       c.getPA().movePlayer(2880, 10199, 1)
break;

Replace #### with the other stairs object id. And don’t forget your colon. ;)[/quote]
for east and west it says the stairs id are the same, both 6087. yet only 1 side doesnt work. is it the face?

Read full topic

item.title: Object not working?
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Its a different object Id for both stairs. Just make it the same moveplayer but change the case ##.
So the new Case would just be.

case ####:
       c.getPA().movePlayer(2880, 10199, 1)
break;

Replace #### with the other stairs object id. And don’t forget your colon.

Read full topic

break;
